body.p: In the IASB’s view, a consistent hedge accounting model requires an objective that describes when and how an entity should:

li.p: override the general recognition and measurement requirements in IFRS (ie when and how an entity should apply hedge accounting); and
recognise effectiveness and/or ineffectiveness of a hedging relationship (ie when and how gains and losses should be recognised).
